text: Vyacheslav Petrovich Vedenin (; 1 October 1941 - 22 October 2021) was a Soviet cross-country skier. His silver medal over 50 km was the only medal won by a Soviet male skier at the 1968 Olympics. He also won a gold and bronze medal at the 1972 Winter Olympics.Vyacheslav Vedenin. sports-reference.com ==References== Category:1941 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Olympic gold medalists for the Soviet Union Category:Olympic silver medalists for the Soviet Union Category:Olympic bronze medalists for the Soviet Union Category:Soviet skiers
title: Vyacheslav Vedenin
